data.title: Paul Nguyen Maeda - Senior Customer Success Manager at Rapid7
data.meta_description: Paul Nguyen Maeda has a diverse work experience spanning various roles and industries.
data.text:
Paul Nguyen Maeda has a diverse work experience spanning various roles and industries. Paul started their career as a Store Employee at Le Repaire de Bacchus from August 2010 to July 2012. Paul then worked as a Kansai desk manager at the French Chamber of Commerce and Industry in Japan for the entire year of 2013. In 2015, they joined EcoVadis as a Support and Engagement professional, staying until March 2016. Following this, they were a Sales and Marketing Executive at Sciforma Corporation from March 2016 to January 2018. In January 2018, Paul worked as a Sales Executive at VAT IT until May of that year. From October 2018 to March 2020, they were a Partner Management Specialist at Robert Walters. In March 2020, they transitioned to become a Customer Success Manager at Datadog, a position they held until July 2023. Currently, Paul is a part of Rapid7 as a Senior Customer Success Manager, starting in January 2023.

Paul Nguyen Maeda has a diverse education history that spans from 1995 to 2015. Starting from their high school years, they attended Lycée International de Saint Germain en Laye from 1995 to 2009, where they pursued a scientific field of study and obtained their Baccalauréat degree. Moving further, from 2009 to 2012, Paul enrolled at Université Paris Nanterre, earning a Bi-licence degree in Gestion et civilisation anglosaxonne. In 2012, they joined Audencia and completed their programme Grande Ecole with a focus on CRM, concluding in 2015. During 2014, they briefly expanded their academic horizons by participating in an exchange program at Université Saint Joseph, concentrating on Management.
